title: Hi! My Name is Nicole Hua
text:
Welcome to my website! For my CV, please visit About
All About Me!
I am in my fourth year at the University of Waterloo and when I graduate, I would like to pursue further education for a master’s in Developmental Psychology and Education.
I am currently volunteering at Pivot Point in Milton where I assist behaviour analysts in supporting adults with diverse abilities. I am expanding my knowledge on ABA therapeutic services, 1:1 sessions with clients, and individualized program planning.
My Interests
I am currently working on building my research experience after gaining a great appreciation for research and data analysis. I have taken data analysis and research courses, providing me with a foundation for working with research.
The discipline of psychology I am the most interested in is developmental psychology. I began working with children at a young age and have since expanded my experiences to working with individuals from diverse demographics. The more I interact with varying populations—such as children, older adults, and indiviuals with cognitive impairments—the more I realize the importance of understanding and researching human development.
